title: Kashmir Deluxe Tour
description: Experience the beauty of Srinagar, Gulmarg, and Pahalgam with a luxurious stay.

viewDetails.detailedDescription: A lavish tour package to experience Kashmir's natural beauty, from the serene Dal Lake to the snow-capped mountains of Gulmarg. Visit top attractions like Mughal Gardens, explore the historical temples of Srinagar, and enjoy the scenic landscapes of Pahalgam and Gulmarg.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Srinagar, check-in to the hotel.
Day 2: Explore Dal Lake, Mughal Gardens, and Shankaracharya Temple.
Day 3: Full-day excursion to Gulmarg, enjoy scenic views and explore.
Day 4: Explore Pahalgam and Betaab Valley.
Day 5: Visit the famous temples and shrines of Srinagar.
Day 6: Shopping in Srinagar market and local sightseeing.

customerReviews.comment: An amazing experience! The tour was well-planned and the views were breathtaking.
Great experience, but I wish the transportation was a bit more comfortable.

title: Srinagar & Gulmarg Adventure
description: A thrilling adventure tour to explore the skiing slopes of Gulmarg and the houseboats of Srinagar.

viewDetails.detailedDescription: This exciting package offers you a thrilling skiing adventure in Gulmarg along with the unique experience of staying on a houseboat in Srinagar. Explore the charm of Srinagar's Dal Lake and enjoy the thrill of skiing in the beautiful snowy landscapes of Gulmarg.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Srinagar, check-in to houseboat.
Day 2: Explore Dal Lake and take a shikara ride.
Day 3: Head to Gulmarg for skiing and snow activities.
Day 4: Skiing, snowboarding, and snowshoe hiking in Gulmarg.

customerReviews.comment: The houseboat experience was unique, and skiing in Gulmarg was unforgettable.
Had a blast on the trip! A little pricey but worth the experience.

title: Kashmir Winter Wonderland
description: Enjoy the winter beauty of Kashmir with skiing and snow activities in Gulmarg.

viewDetails.detailedDescription: Immerse yourself in the serene winter landscapes of Kashmir, featuring world-class skiing in Gulmarg. This tour combines snow activities and a luxury stay at top resorts, giving you an unparalleled winter adventure experience.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Srinagar, transfer to Gulmarg.
Day 2: Skiing and snow activities in Gulmarg.
Day 4: Explore the local snow resorts.
Day 5: Visit the historical sites and museums in Gulmarg.
Day 6: Leisure day in Gulmarg, enjoy spa and local food.

customerReviews.comment: Best skiing experience of my life. The resort was fabulous!
Amazing snow activities, though the hotel service could have been a bit faster.
